full_summary:
# Janitorial Services for Various DND Buildings (NCR)

## About This Opportunity
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking bids for Janitorial Services for various buildings across the National Capital Region (NCR).

## Summary
The successful bidder will provide janitorial services, including labour, materials, and equipment, for up to five buildings in Ottawa (ON) and Gatineau (QC). These services must comply with the attached Statement of Work.

## Time Sensitive Information
A site visit was originally scheduled for February 23, 2023 at 10:00am, but please disregard the former posting's response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by March 13th, 2023 at 2:00pm EST.  All bids submitted after 2:00pm EST will be considered non-responsive.

## Bidding Requirements
Bidders must communicate with the Contracting Authority no later than 2:00pm, February 16, 2023 to confirm attendance and provide the name(s) and date of birth of the person(s) who will attend. Bidders who fail to comply will not be permitted to attend the mandatory site visit.

## Tender Details
- **Tender Number:** WS3777623338-DOC3844898678
- **Request for Proposal (RFP) ID:** EJ196-211022
- **Closing Date:** March 21st, 2023, 2:00pm EST
- **Scheduled Site Visit Date:** February 23rd, 2023 ( subject to change)

## Trade Agreements
This procurement is open to Canadian and international bidders, who have agreements with the government of Canada.

## Details Contact
Shauna Barrett (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [shauna.barrett@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:shauna.barrett@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
